MSMPagingToolbar

Extends the functionality of the paging toolbar.  Add the buttons Expand All and Collapse All to open, or Close all Row Expander grid.  Add button “New Map” to create a new map to add it to geostore

Inherits from

  • <Ext.PagingToolbar>

See also

  • MSMGridPanel
Summary
MSMPagingToolbarExtends the functionality of the paging toolbar.
Properties
config{object} object for configuring the component.
autoWidth
desc{string} Title of the new map
mapUrl{url} url to MapComposer
limit{integer} limit param for the first page load
textNewMap{string} text for New Map button
tooltipNewMap{string} text for New Map tooltip
textUserManager{string} text for User Manager button
tooltipNewMap{string} text for New Map tooltip
textExpandAll{string} text for Expand All button
tooltipExpandAll{string} text for Collapse All tooltip
textCollapseAll{string} text for Collapse All button
tooltipCollapseAll{string} text for Collapse All tooltip
displayMsg{string} string to add in displayMsg of Ext.PagingToolbar
emptyMsg{string} string to add in emptyMsg of Ext.PagingToolbar
firstText{string} go to the first page of grid
lastText{string} go to the last page of grid
nextText{string} go to the next page of grid
prevText{string} go to the previous page of grid
refreshText{string} refresh the content of grid
beforePageText{string} string to add in DeleteMap tooltip
Functions
initComponentInitializes the component
